title: One sin and a hundreds of good deeds

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
If a visitor visits you they have to roll 10 d6's.
if more than 6 of those are higher than 2 the visitor gets healed.
If all of them are higher than 2 everyone of that member's faction gets healed.
If this appears flip a coin. On head, spawn Plauge Doctor (4388)

fields.name: Wincon:
fields.value: Cannot have their own winning condition due having the lowest threat.
